body_html:
This looks to be an issue with pip.
Did you try "sudo pip...." That lets you change system libraries, rather than only your own.
Moreover, it looks like you need to set LD_LIBRARY_PATH for all accounts on your system.
You can try looking at this:
https://www.google.com/search?q=LD_LIBRARY_PATH+ubuntu+system&oq=LD_LIBRARY_PATH+ubuntu+system&aqs=chrome..69i64j0l2j69i57.6390j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8

Closing, as this is a pip and CUDA installation issue.
